item.title: Team World beats Team Europe to claim back-to-back Laver Cup titles
item.description: Team World won eight of the nine matches played over three days to cruise to a second win.

item.title: Keonigsegg Gemera Boosts Output to 2300 HP with new optional V8
item.description: The production version of Koenigsegg's four-seat supercar will offer a 5.0-liter V-8 along with the original three-cylinder powertrain, with both engines mated to a single e-motor.

item.title: Mars Perseverance rover engineer credits Queens high school
item.description: Vishnu Sridhar is the lead systems engineer for Perseverance's SuperCam. He grew up in Rego Park, Queens, and attended Aviation High School in Sunnyside.

item.title: Coast Guard arrests a man trying to run a giant hamster wheel across the Atlantic
item.description: Reza Baluchi was taken in by the U.S. Coast Guard last week while trying to cross the Atlantic in a "hydro pod" made of buoys. Authorities in Flagler County, Fla., responded to Baluchi and his vessel in 2021 and posted photos of his vessel on Facebook.

item.title: Sierra Space raises $290 million
item.description: Sierra Space says a new $290 million funding round will support work on its Dream Chaser vehicles and commercial space station plans. Credit: Sierra Space
